title: A community for life-giving food
description: The cornerstone of our wellness is the food we eat. Even the preparation and cooking is part of a meditation on our wellness.

title: Reconnect through community dance
description: Dance can be a primal camp-fire experience, or it can be a sophisticated ballroom performance.  All of it is part of revealing our human spirit.

title: Discover connection through healing practices
description: Tai Chi, meditation, kinesiology, chiropractic...there are many gifts to share with each other.

title: Explore music for building relationship
description: Sharing our musical talents rekindles our shared humanity.  Vocals, Guitar, flute, violin, drums...all are valued!

title: Recharge and renew through social exercise
description: Yoga, hiking, swimming, cycling...there are many ways to build a physical relationship with our own bodies.

title: Experience beauty and stewardship
description: Outings and camping trips expand our connection to nature and renew our souls.
